A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I loved it.  It's hard to review this without spoilers\, but they did everything right in this movie.  They addressed many of my frustrations from the 7th movie\, and put a cork in a couple of the "flaws" others saw in that movie.

****SPOILERS BELOW******


We finally get to see Leia use the force - which was satisfying\, as in almost all of the literature she is one of the most powerful Jedi in the Universe.

Luke gets a completely fitting ending.

I don't get Kylo's head on a pike\, but it looks like he stays a villain - so my Christmas wish just might come true in the future\, and as a bonus - I get a dead Snoke.

ANYWAY\, it is a fantastic addition to the series\, and really rises above episode 7 (in my mind).  

Also\, they don't blow up a big circular death machine at the end.  Here's to hoping that also doesn't happen in episode 9.
